ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted
1 (8 ounce) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
des: "Mushrooms, celery and water chestnuts add texture and crunch in this comforting casserole. Chicken and rice are perfect partners that always satisfy.--Linda Durnil, Decatur, Illinois"
ins: In a bowl, combine the first 10 ingredients. Transfer to a greased 2-1/2-qt. baking dish. Combine the cracker crumbs and butter; sprinkle over the top. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 30-35 minutes or until bubbly.
